Inbox.description: Take a tile from the input conveyor.

Outbox.description: Put the current tile onto the output conveyor.

Copy from.description: Copy a tile on the ground into the hand.

Copy to.description: Copy a tile from the hand to the ground.

Add.description: Add the specified tile to the tile in your hand.

Subtract.description: Subtract the specified tile from the tile in your hand.

Bump down.description: Decrement the specified tile and copy it to the hand.

Bump up.description: Decrement the specified tile and copy it to the hand.

Jump if zero.description: Jump to the specified label if the tile in your hand is zero.

Jump if negative.description: Jump to the specified label if the tile in your hand is negative.
